item.title: Chaos in Logic
item.description: Keeping up with the traditions I’ve set-up a few days ago, we’re going to talk about chaos. “Oh no, yet another boring example of a Henon map ? Maybe with colors this time ? Or just the Lorentz Attractor with some platitudes on the chaos in life itself ?”, you may say, snarkily. Well, voices in my head, no, not quite. I kinda dig logic as a field. And by “dig”, I mean looking from afar and vaguely nodding when someones talks to me about consistency of a formal system.
